name: Greg Hammer, MD
description: Author, Gain Without Pain. Foreword by Daniel J. Seigel, MD: "Filled with fascinating interviews of leading experts and insights into how to transform personal and professional challenges into strength and wisdom."

name: Gina Bria
role: Researcher, consultant & speaker: hydration strategies for health & agriculture
description: Named Knowledge Partner with US State Department AIM Initiative, and Real World Scholar. Recipient, BUCKMINSTER FULLER DESIGN SCIENCE STUDIO AWARD. Promoting optimal hydration for people, plants, and soils.

name: Linda Leum
description: Anesthesiologist in Santa Cruz, CA. Affiliated with multiple hospitals, including  Providence Regional Medical Center Everett  & Dominican Hospital . Degree from Harvard Medical School. In practice for over 20-years.

name: Mandy Hawes
description: Partner at class-action litigation firm Alexander, Hawes & Audet. Graduate of Wellesley College. Awarded Juris Doctorate by Harvard Law School. Pioneer in toxic chemical litigation and medical effects of toxic chemicals.

name: Michael Likosky
description: Lawyer in public-private projects and organizations for the last twenty years, advising government including Governors Newsom, Brown, Murphy, and Cuomo.

name: Mukul Bakshi
description: Copywriter and Creative Director at Tungsten. Absolutely stark raving mad.

name: Piotr Uchman
description: Track record of business development by creating sales clusters. Experience running hybrid sales model to deliver opportunities in developing technologies and new markets. Expert in renewable technologies, storage technologies, and policies guiding adoption.

name: Randy Olson
description: Professional photographer specializing in global narratives in social documentary, commercial and advertising photography.

name: Tim Blake
description: Author, Imagery to Life. Dedicated to those without a chance to experience beauty in nature. Especially kids with health challenges who likely have never been able to see the ocean, or experience other sights and sounds of nature.

name: George Orbelian
description: Planet Positive Ventures: a venture capital think tank and investment advisory firm founded by industry veterans to address humanity’s most pressing needs and its symbiotic existence with nature.

name: Federica Armstrong
description: Visual storyteller born in Italy. Currently residing in Palo Alto, CA. Her storytelling includes documentary and fine art on environmental and social issues, and personal narratives related to intimacy & belonging.

name: Eric C. Wentworth
description: Award-winning Marketing Communications professional. Expertise in advertising, branding, copywriting, creative direction, PR, sales support, web design & content, promotion, event planning, social media, print and broadcast production.

name: David Gibson
description: Leading teacher, researcher, composer, and innovator in the field of sound healing and sound therapy. Author of The Complete Guide to Sound Healing.

name: Carol Ann Wentworth
description: Co-author of A Mindful Career. 25-year experience in executive search and professional coaching. Award winning recruiter: President’s Club, Top Producer, North Bay Networking “Businessperson of the Year.” Passionate connector of people.
